content:
Is there a reason why linking from a ValueSet's concepts to the concepts defined within the corresponding CodeSystem in an IG works only if the CodeSystem has got CodeSystem.content=complete? see http://www.hl7.org/fhir/valueset-codesystem-content-mode.html

Why wouldn't it work for e.g. fragment?

@Grahame Grieve
I' m not surprised to see bugs in around content != complete. How to reproduce?
Simply, by having a code system with CodeSystem.content=fragment and a value set that includes that code system.
I filed an issue with an example: https://github.com/HL7/fhir-ig-publisher/issues/376
Do you have an estimate when this issue could be tackled?
